text: avanē, bhūmiyalli nim'mannu pratinidhigaḷāgi kaḷuhisidavanu mattu nimagēnannu nīḍalāgideyō ā mūlaka nim'mannu parīkṣisalikkāgi nim'malli kelavarige itara kelavariginta unnata sthānagaḷannu nīḍidavanu. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū nim'moḍeyanu kṣipravāgi śikṣisuvavanāgiddāne mattu nis'sandēhavāgiyū avanu kṣamāśīlanū karuṇāmayiyū āgiddāne
